# Nend

## Example

```html
<amp-ad
  width="320"
  height="50"
  type="nend"
  data-nend_params='{"media":82,"site":58536,"spot":127513,"type":1,"oriented":1}'
>
</amp-ad>
```

## Configuration

For configuration details and to generate your tags, please contact https://www.nend.net/inquiries/form/

Supported parameters:

-   `data-nend_params`
